nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: fully floored
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I don't care what kind of floor it is, but I expect my bedroom to have a constructed floor.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: wooden floor
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I love the look and feel of wooden floors.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: stone floor
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I don't care what kind of stone it is, or whether its flagstones or bricks, I just want some nice solid stone under my feet.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: concrete or metal floor
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: Other floors are too hard to clean. I want a nice, smooth floor. Any one of: concrete, paved tile, steel, silver, gold, sterile tile.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: brick floor
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: Stone is nice, but flagstones are too rough. I want some well-cut stone bricks for my floor.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: metal floor
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: A floor made of real metal. Steel, silver, gold, or sterile tile are all acceptable.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: carpeted floor
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want nice, soft carpet in my bedroom. It doesn't matter what color.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: silver metal floor or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: A floor made of some fancy metal, silver or gold.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: sterile tile floor
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want cleanest floor the world has ever known. Sterile tile, fit for surgery.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: gold metal floor
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I'll settle for nothing short of gold, because I'm worth it.
